cards.title: Active Cyber Insurance
cards.body: Manage and transfer cyber risk with broad coverage and access active monitoring and in-house incident response to help protect your business before, during, and after an incident.

cards.title: Active Tech E&O
cards.body: Comprehensive and innovative errors and omissions coverage to help technology businesses protect from legal and financial losses.

cards.title: Active Executive Risks
cards.body: Protect your company and leaders from management liability risks – like those associated with M&A, regulatory changes, remote work, cybercrime, and more.

cards.title: Coalition Control TM
cards.body: Get the visibility you need to take charge of your cyber risk with Coalition Control — the industry-leading risk management platform for every organization.

cards.title: Managed Detection & Response
cards.body: Respond and recover from cyber attacks faster – and help prevent future attacks. See how with the expertise, technology, and tools of Coalition's MDR.

cards.title: Incident Response
cards.body: Our in-house staff of incident responders, forensic specialists, and security engineers respond in minutes, not days, to help you recover from cyber attacks.
